messages.content: Extract structured medical data in JSON format.
Patient diagnosed with COPD, SpO2 at 87% on room air. Needs portable oxygen concentrator for use during exertion and sleep. Dr. Chase signed the order.
{"device": "portable oxygen concentrator", "diagnosis": "COPD", "SpO2": "87%", "usage": ["exertion", "sleep"], "ordering_provider": "Dr. Chase"}
Extract structured medical data in JSON format.
Patient needs CPAP supplies: full face mask, headgear, filters. Ordered by Dr. House.
{"product": "CPAP supplies", "components": ["full face mask", "headgear", "filters"], "ordering_provider": "Dr. House"}
Extract structured medical data in JSON format.
Patient is non-ambulatory and requires a hospital bed with trapeze bar and side rails. Diagnosis: late-stage ALS. Order submitted by Dr. Cuddy.
{"device": "hospital bed", "features": ["trapeze bar", "side rails"], "diagnosis": "ALS", "mobility_status": "non-ambulatory", "ordering_provider": "Dr. Cuddy"}
Extract structured medical data in JSON format.
Asthma diagnosis confirmed. Prescribing nebulizer with mouthpiece and tubing. Dr. Foreman completed the documentation.
{"device": "nebulizer", "accessories": ["mouthpiece", "tubing"], "diagnosis": "Asthma", "ordering_provider": "Dr. Foreman"}
Extract structured medical data in JSON format.
Patient requires oxygen therapy due to severe sleep apnea. Ordered portable oxygen concentrator by Dr. Wilson.
{"device": "portable oxygen concentrator", "diagnosis": "severe sleep apnea", "ordering_provider": "Dr. Wilson"}
Extract structured medical data in JSON format.
Patient has mobility issues due to MS. Recommended a lightweight manual wheelchair with elevating leg rests. Ordered by Dr. Taub.
{"device": "manual wheelchair", "type": "lightweight", "features": ["elevating leg rests"], "diagnosis": "MS", "ordering_provider": "Dr. Taub"}
Extract structured medical data in JSON format.
Orthopedic injury. Patient requires adjustable knee brace and compression socks. Dr. Hadley approved the order.
{"device": "adjustable knee brace", "accessories": ["compression socks"], "diagnosis": "Orthopedic injury", "ordering_provider": "Dr. Hadley"}
Extract structured medical data in JSON format.
Severe arthritis diagnosis. Prescribed ergonomic cane with wrist strap and foam grip. Ordered by Dr. Masters.
{"device": "ergonomic cane", "features": ["wrist strap", "foam grip"], "diagnosis": "Severe arthritis", "ordering_provider": "Dr. Masters"}
Extract structured medical data in JSON format.
Patient has Parkinson’s disease with tremors. Prescribed weighted utensils and non-slip mat. Ordered by Dr. Adams.
{"product": "weighted utensils", "features": ["non-slip mat"], "diagnosis": "Parkinson’s disease", "ordering_provider": "Dr. Adams"}
Extract structured medical data in JSON format.
Patient needs diabetic supplies: glucose monitor, lancets, test strips. Ordered by Dr. Benson.
{"product": "diabetic supplies", "components": ["glucose monitor", "lancets", "test strips"], "ordering_provider": "Dr. Benson"}
Extract structured medical data in JSON format.
Chronic back pain diagnosis. Prescribed lumbar support cushion and posture corrector. Ordered by Dr. Reyes.
{"device": "lumbar support cushion", "accessories": ["posture corrector"], "diagnosis": "Chronic back pain", "ordering_provider": "Dr. Reyes"}
Extract structured medical data in JSON format.
Patient has carpal tunnel syndrome. Prescribed wrist splint and ergonomic mouse. Ordered by Dr. Kim.
{"device": "wrist splint", "accessories": ["ergonomic mouse"], "diagnosis": "Carpal tunnel syndrome", "ordering_provider": "Dr. Kim"}
Extract structured medical data in JSON format.
Patient requires assistive technology for vision impairment. Ordered screen magnifier and Braille keyboard. Dr. Patel authorized the order.
{"product": "assistive technology", "components": ["screen magnifier", "Braille keyboard"], "diagnosis": "vision impairment", "ordering_provider": "Dr. Patel"}
